mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_point ( point_id, course_id, name, description, parent_id, difficultylevel, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{pointId}, #{courseId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{difficultylevel, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_point SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, difficultylevel = #{difficultylevel, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE point_id = #{pointId}
mapper.select: SELECT kp.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resource_knowledge_point rkp WHERE rkp.point_id = kp.point_id) AS resource_count FROM knowledge_point kp WHERE point_id = #{pointId}
SELECT kp.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resource_knowledge_point rkp WHERE rkp.point_id = kp.point_id) AS resource_count FROM knowledge_point kp WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
